Author: Rumi
Content: Somewhere beyond right and wrong there is a garden. I'll meet you there.

Author: Bruce Lee
Content: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.

Author: Ralph Marston
Content: Don't waste time on excuses, just get it done

Author: Lao Tzu
Content: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving

Author: Earl Nightingale
Content: Never give up on a dream just because it will take time to accomplish it. Time will pass anyway

Author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
Content: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.

Author: Albert Einstein
Content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

Author: Maya Angelou
Content: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

Author: Nelson Mandela
Content: It always seems impossible until it's done.

Author: Confucius
Content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

Author: Mark Twain
Content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

Author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
Content: Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.

Author: Winston Churchill
Content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

Author: Steve Jobs
Content: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Content: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

Author: Dalai Lama
Content: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

Author: Helen Keller
Content: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

Author: Aristotle
Content: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Content: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?

Author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
Content: Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever has not kindness has not faith.

Author: Henry Ford
Content: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't â€“ you're right.

Author: J.K. Rowling
Content: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

Author: Albert Einstein
Content: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Content: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Content: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Content: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

Author: John Lennon
Content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Content: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Content: The time is always right to do what is right.
